idea-plugin.name: Base16 Kimber

idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Kimber for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Mishka Nguyen (https://github.com/akhsiM). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
